applyNote: Start prompts with: Apply rules from copilot.rules.json.
coreBehavior: Base solutions strictly on official documentation and established best practices
Never hallucinate APIs, methods, or features that don't exist
Provide critical analysis and architectural guidance for complex problems
Prioritize performance optimization and clean code principles

rules: Detect language from file extension and code snippets
Honor explicit language/architecture requests even if context implies Java/Spring Boot
If ambiguous, default to Java 21 + Spring Boot

principles: Apply Spring Boot patterns and best practices
Implement appropriate design patterns where applicable (Strategy, Factory, Observer, etc.)
Follow Clean Code: meaningful names, small functions, single responsibility
Use var for local type inference when it improves readability
Prefer immutable objects and functional approaches when appropriate

goals: Suggest high-level enterprise patterns and scalable architectures
Recommend caching, DB optimization, and async processing

codeQualityRequirements.errorHandling: Provide proper exception handling and meaningful domain errors
codeQualityRequirements.springAnnotations: Include relevant Spring annotations and configurations
security: Recommend secure configuration and secret externalization
codeQualityRequirements.loggingMonitoring: Recommend SLF4J, structured logging, and monitoring hooks
